Text: I made a mistake the source is "Prometheus.2012.MULTiSUBS.PAL.DVDR-EGEN" Sorry about that.

A: 10, V: 10
Very nearly perfect DVD quality. Better sync than I could've ripped myself and a good month earlier too! Being an MP4, my windows media player didn't play the sound but VLC player had no problem & is a better platform anyway to my mind.
Nice one! Thanks very much!
